mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bill(PROPERTY_ID, NAME, FEE) VALUES
(#{item.property}, #{item.name}, #{item.fee})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT bill.id, bill.name, fee, bill.create_time, r.name AS residence, bill.time_stamp FROM bill JOIN property p on bill.property_id = p.id JOIN residence r on p.residence_id = r.id ORDER BY bill.time_stamp DESC

SELECT p.name AS property, r.name AS resident, r.phone, pay_time, IF(pay_time IS NULL, '未缴费', '已缴费') AS status FROM bill JOIN property p on bill.property_id = p.id JOIN resident r on p.id = r.property_id JOIN residence r2 on p.residence_id = r2.id WHERE r2.name = #{name} ORDER BY bill.time_stamp DESC

SELECT bill.id, bill.name, fee, bill.create_time, r.name AS resident, bill.pay_time, bill.time_stamp, p.name AS property_id FROM bill JOIN property p on bill.property_id = p.id JOIN residence r on p.residence_id = r.id WHERE property_id = #{id} AND pay_time IS NULL ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT bill.id, bill.name, fee, bill.create_time, r.name AS resident, bill.pay_time, bill.time_stamp, p.name AS property_id FROM bill JOIN property p on bill.property_id = p.id JOIN residence r on p.residence_id = r.id WHERE property_id = #{id} AND pay_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE bill SET pay_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
